name: Rex Rocket: Mobile
description:
Rex Rocket is a 2D platformer that has old-school and younger gamers alike praising its challenging gameplay, gorgeous pixel environments, and awesome power-ups. Toss in a catchy chiptunes soundtrack with some quirky dialogue (warning: random references aplenty!) and you've got yourself one of the most memorable retro-inspired indie games!


STORY
Be a space hero as either Captain Rexford or Rexanna! Your scientific transport mission takes a turn for the worse when the ship's AI goes rogue and releases all the deadly bio-engineered specimens. With the help of close friends, hidden power-ups, and powerful weapons, you must blast your way through a host of aliens and machines to take back control of the S.S. Montana before it's too late!


FEATURES
Gorgeous pixel art graphics with over 100 hand-crafted ship rooms!
One of the catchiest retro soundtracks by Saskrotch!
Collect tons of new weapons, upgrades, info nodes, and more!
Filled with difficult bosses and platforming sections!
